DOC.brief_summary: The objective compare effectiveness 4 different commercial weight-loss diet available adult UK . This achieve 6 month multi-centre randomise unblinded control trial - Dr Atkins ' New Diet Revolution , - The slimFast Plan , - The weight Watchers Pure Points Programme , - Rosemary Conley 's `` Eat Yourself Slim '' Diet & Fitness Plan . - No diet ( control ) Subjects community base sample 300 ( 60 per group ) otherwise healthy overweight obese adult . Main outcome measure weight body fat change 6 month .
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness Commercial Weight Loss Programmes
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) > 27 < 40 kg/m2 . History coronary heart disease Type 1 Type 2 diabetes Renal , liver respiratory failure Gout Taking lipid lower antihypertensive drug History obesity know cause ( i.e . Cushings disease , hypothyroidism ) Previous gastric weight loss surgery Taking weight loss drug ( include Orlistat Sibutramine ) Clinical depression Eating disorder Drug alcohol abuse Any malabsorptive state ( include lactose intolerance ) Being treat malignancy Being pregnant Breastfeeding
